title: manamaDanguvadE
sahitya:
manamaDanguvadE pErinbam maTrevaiyAlum vilagumO tunbam anda



anupallavi



 dinam dinam alaindum sheyalariyAmal tighaittut-tighaittu paridavittut-tiriyum anda



caraNam 1



anniyar dhanattAshaiyAlE sadA alakkaNuTru bhuviyin mElE kanniyariccaiyAlum

 mEnmElE kalangik-kalangi mighak-karaindu nondiDum anda



caraNam 2



varum varum enavE Engi dinam varunduvadai viTTu nIngi harikEshan

 pAdattanbu koNDOngi anbenum kaDaltanil AzhndiDada anda
